text: Used Cars is a 1980 American black comedy movie directed by Robert Zemeckis and starring Kurt Russell, Jack Warden, Gerrit Graham, Frank McRae, Cheryl Rixon, Alfonso Arau, Deborah Harmon, Michael McKean. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Used Cars
